alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 23 at 9:17AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...flooding is possible. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...flooding is possible. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Oberlin. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur with several access roads to the river flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 1.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Tuesday, January 30. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Oberlin 13.0 1.3 Tue 8 am CST 2.7 10.2 10.8 &&
